1.content:
Alright, let's get this going.

Who's the lucky victim?
1.title: TIME TO BEGIIIN

choices: She wakes up feeling stranger than normal.
She eats something that doesn't agree with her.
She's in the middle of Chemistry class.
Chris Alice signs Creepie up for a SUPER FUN ACTIVITY!
Creepie's mom cooked her a delicious meal.
11.content: So, how should Creepie's story begin?
11.title: Creepie Creecher

choices: Her butt had turned into a giant, jiggling bug abdomen!
Her scalp had transformed into a bunch of wriggling tentacles!
She was looking puffy all over!
111.content:
"Mmmnnnghh, five more minutes..." Creepie groaned as she started to stir from her dreams. She sat up in her bed and scratched her underarm. "Mmmmrrm.... wait... something feels a little off..." She wasn't sure exactly what it was, but she felt... different today. She hopped down from her bed, stretching her arms. She just couldn't put her finger on it.

She skittered down the halls, getting weird glances from her insect siblings. "What are you guys LOOKING at?" she said, furrowing her brow. She ignored the murmuring and buzzing surrounding her and went downstairs.

"Hey mom."

"Good morning, Creepella!" her mother said, "And how did you sleep last ni-AAAUGH!!" She recoiled in shock as she saw her daughter.

"What? What's wrong?"

"D-dear..." her mom stuttered, "H-have you looked at yourself this morning?"

"Uhhh, no? What, bed head?" Creepie rolled her eyes.

"Nnnnnot EXACTLY, dear... Maybe you should take a look in the mirror?"

"Alright, fine, whatever..." Creepie walked over to a large mirror and her jaw practically dropped to the ground when she saw...
111.title: One Creepie Morning

choices: Went upstairs to check out her new ass.
Went to school to meet up with Chris Alice.
1111.content:
"AAAAAUGH! What happened?!" Creepie screamed, staring with wide eyes at the gigantic, rubbery sphere attached to her. Her butt had grown out into giant, bouncy abdomen, bigger than the rest of her entire body! "Great... THIS is gonna be fun to carry around," she sneered. Even the slightest movement caused her new bug booty to jiggle around behind her. She wasn't sure how she hadn't noticed it beforehand, since it bounced off the ground like a basketball with every step she took. She turned around, her big bug badonkadonk knocking the mirror down to the ground, shattering loudly. "Uhhh.... oops."

"CREEPIE?!" Her mom stared in bewilderment. Huge abdomens were nothing new to the house, but Creepie was sporting the biggest she had ever seen! "Are..... are you feeling okay?"

"Yeah, mom, I feel GREAT," Creepie said, rolling her eyes, "Just have a giant BUTT to carry around is all. OoOoOhhhh..." she shivered. A gentle breeze blew against the back of her abdomen, where a giant, pink, puffy anus sat for all to see. It slowly puckered, open and shut, open and shut. It was the strangest feeling to her, one she hadn't felt before. Her eyelids shut, a goofy grin crossed her face.

*PFFFRRRRAAAPPT!!*

Her cheeks turned a bright red. A thick, fog of smelly gas swirled around behind her. "Uhh... heh, heh, excuse me."

"Eugh, Creepella! Manners!" her mom fanned the air away from her face.

Creepie smiled sheepishly and...
1111.title: Creepie and her Big Bouncy Bug Butt

choices: Farted out a thik, sticky web.
Noticed her butt was starting to grow even bigger.
11111.content:
Creepie walked through the halls, her bug bum bouncing off the ground with each little step she took. Each time it slapped against the ground, a loud, powerful fart blasted out of her fleshy butt hole. A thick, smelly trail followed her through the hallway, various bugs dropping to the floor as they inhaled the horrendous odor.

"Sorry, guys-*PFFFRRRPRPPPT!* Uhh, just something I ate... *BRRAAAPPTT!*"

She reached her room and slammed the door behind her. "Eugh.... now, what am I gonna do with YOU?" she said, squeezing her butt with both hands, squeezing a nasty fart out of her gaping butt hole. "Whew.... didn't know they smelled THAT bad..." she waved her gas away from her face. She was always different, but THIS was going a bit too far. "Hmmm..." she pondered. She reached back to her anus and gently prodded it, a sticky liquid strand sticking to her finger tip. "MMmmnnn.... feels nice, though..."

With another disgusting fart, Creepie...
11111.title: Went upstairs to check out her new ass.

choices: Her arms and legs turned into tentacles too.
Her mouth started to turn into a monsterous maw.
Her legs fused together into a giant, slimy tail.
1112.content:
Creepie's eyes went wide as she saw what had happened. On top of her head, where her colorful hair used to be, were now 8 flesh colored tentacles waving around, dripping pink goo onto the floor. She raised a hand up to her head, running it along one of the flopping tentacles. "OoOoOoOhHh...." she moaned, feeling a weird, tingling sensation flow through her.

"Are you okay, Creepella?" her mom asked, staring at the wobbling appendages.

"Not a bad 'do, I could live with this," Creepie said, smirking. She was definitely going to get some looks at school today!


She grinned as people stared at her tentacles as she walked by them, waving back to them with her slimy tentacles. She wasn't exactly sure WHY or HOW this happened to her, but she didn't really mind. Creepie was always pretty weird, she had no problem being a little weirder. When she finally reached her school, she saw Chris-Alice waiting for her. "Heheh, this is gonna be good..." she snickered, sneaking up on her from behind. "Hey Chris-Alice," Creepie said, tapping her shoulder with one of her slimy tentacles.

"Hey there, Creep-AAAAGHHH!!! WHAT HAPPENED!?" Chris-Alice shrieked.

"You like? Figured I'd do something different with my hair," the goth joked, gently caressing two of her appendages. The bell rang out. "Guess it's time to show these babies off to the rest of school."

But the tentacles were only the FIRST of Creepie's strange mutation...
1112.title: Creepie the Squid Head!

choices: made it to the nurse's office.
11123.content:
Making her way towards her classroom, Creepie's frightening new hairdo certainly attracted some unsurprising whimpers and screams from her fellow classmates. A few students even jumped out of the window from the slightest twitching of her cranial tendrils. "Creepie, what is THAT ON YOUR HEAD?!" Budge screamed right at the moment he encountered his friend.

"Nothing much. Just trying something new." Creepie spoke to her friend as calm as she normally speaks. Usually, Creepie's lifestyle doesn't panic Budge. After all, he was the only friend who knows the Goth was raised by insects rather than humans. "Oh man, this is exactly like that movie: When Squids and People Merge." Budge said.

"Real life seems to be the perfect inspiration for horror movies, isn't it?" Creepie said as she stroked her tentacles.

"Ok, class, take your seats." Dr. Pappas said as he walked, "We have much to go over before....GOOD MOTHER OF GOD!!!" he screamed as he glanced at Creepie's squid-like head. His reaction caused everyone except Creepie and Budge to scream! "This is something I'd expect from a H.P. Lovecraft novel." Dr. Pappas whimpered as he cowered behind his desk.

"And good morning to you too, Dr. Pappas." Creepie joked. "Miss. Creecher; might I suggest you go see the nurse?" he said as he showed only his eyes. "Why not? I could use a walk anyway." Creepie said as she walked out the door. Making her way to the nurse's office, she heard some tearing happening right below her.

Her pants and shoes were soon destroyed as her legs became fatter. "Mmm. This is weird." Creepie said, "Then again, it fits since I have a squid head." As she watched her legs multiplied in size, she then noticed they fused together to become a giant limb.

"Wow. A tail." Creepie said as she wagged it, "Wicked." Once she became adjusted to her tail, she...
11123.title: Her Legs Fuse into a Slimy Tail.

112.content:
Creepie sighed as she rubbed her belly and walked into the kitchen which was surprisingly quiet for once. Creepie went to the fridge and opened it. Looking around the fridge full of various food her mom made, she wasn't sure if anything in the fridge wasn't alive at some time or another.

"Jeez, anything to eat?" She asked herself as she soon saw it, it was a delicious looking chocolate cake! She took it out of the fridge and cut heself a piece, put the cake back in the fridge,, sat down at the table and scarfed the cake down, it had an odd taste, but it was still delicious. As Creepie was about to wash the dishes she gasped and dropped the plate, it shattering on the floor. She was...
112.title: She eats something that doesn't agree with ...

113.content:
During the 5th period in Middle School, Creepie and Budge were partners in Chemistry class. "Now remember, class." Dr. Pappas said, "Always wear your protective goggles while working this experiment. But most importantly, don't get these chemicals onto your skin."

"Man, I hate Chemistry class." Budge whispered to Creepie, "I always feel like something's going to go wrong and one of us mutates into something creepy." Creepie gave him an offended face. "Err...I mean...something unusual." Budge said. "Budge, you watch too of those sci-fi movies." Creepie said, "Now pass me the purple stuff."

"Here." Budge said, "All the more reason to be cautious around these substances."

To his mistake, he gave her the wrong cup of purple stuff. Then without warning, a massive cloud began to stir. "Budge, what did you give me?!" Creepie said. "The purple stuff like you said!" Budge said.

Dr. Pappas and everyone else gasped. "DUCK AND COVER!!!" Dr. Pappas screamed. "HIT THE DECK!!" Budge hollered. Everyone ducked except for Creepie. Before she could move, the unstable concoction exploded into her face! Destroying her goggles, her eyes got a full blast of chemicals! The rest of her body was just as lucky. Her hands were covered in the nasty gas while some of it seeped into her clothes.

"Miss Creecher!" Dr. Pappas said, "Budge, take her to the nurse's office at once!" "Right away, sir!" Budge said. "Oh man." Budge said as he lifted back Creepie, "This is what I was talking about!"

Taking her into the hallway, Budge heard Creepie say, "I don't feel so good." Suddenly, she burped out loud! Then she began to mutate into a...
113.title: Never Make Mistakes in Chemistry Class.

1131.content:
Budge accidentally dropped Creepie onto the floor as she moaned louder. Standing up, she placed her hand on her temples.

"Ugghh...what's happening...to me?" she asked as she felt her face becoming puffy. Her skin began to produce a purple, icing like substance that covered most of her body. "Cool. Slime." she said. As the slime continued to flow from her body, her skin started to become dough-like. It felt like she was becoming thicker and rubbery!

Soon, her body began to morph into 4 layers like those of a cake's! Her bottom layer sported the same, Gothic spiky shapes like her dress had as it stretched 4 feet across; giving her an almost-ballerina shaped appearance as her legs were positioned underneath her! Her stomach became rounder as it became 3 feet across. Her dress's bottom was torn to shreds; leaving her naked.

Her limbs became puffier; they soon became as wide as Budge's arms and legs. Her hair became thicker as more slime coated them! When it was over, Creepie was now a cake girl!

"Whoa...Why do I look so bloated?" she asked. "Creepie, you...you're a..." Budge stammered. When Creepie turned to face her friend, she...
1131.title: Creepie the Cake Girl!

choices: a window to fly out of.
1132.content:
Groaning, she could feel something stirring inside her fore-head. Soon, two tiny points sprouted from her fore-head! Soon, they began to grow bigger and bigger until they became a pair of massive mandibles as twice as long as her arms! They were sharp enough to be mistaken for daggers!

"Wicked." Creepie said as she saw her mandibles.

Soon a pair of wings tore through the back of her dress, stretching as twice her height! Her fingers and toes became claws! Even more frightening, an extra pair of arms grew from her dress! "Wow." Creepie said.

"Creepie, you're a bug girl!" Budge whimpered. "Indeed." Creepie said, "From the looks of it, I've become a stag beetle. The mandibles are unusual since only the males have them."

"Maybe she should get you to the nurse now." Budge said. "Are you kidding?" Creepie said, "This is amazing! Now let's see. What to do with my new form?"

As she pondered, she saw....
1132.title: Creepie's Now a Insect Girl!

114.content:
It was another usual school day where Creepie was reading the latest issue of Arthropods Monthly. "HEEEYYY, CREEEPPPIEEE!!" shrilled an all-too common voice. "Yes, Chris-Alice?" asked Creepie in her usual dull tone. Most people would have their eardrums shattered if they had this perky girl signal her arrival with her voice.

"There's going to be a special activity after school!" Chris-Alice said. "And?" Creepie asked. "I SIGNED YOU UP FOR IT!!" she said. "Why am I not surprised?" Creepie said.

"Wanna to know the best part?" Chris-Alice asked. Creepie just gave her a quiet look. "It's a complete SURPRISE!! I DON'T EVEN KNOW WHAT IT IS!" "Yet you signed me up for it, anyway?" Creepie asked. "Just thought you would like a nice surprise!" Chris-Alice said.

"Very thoughtful of you, Chris-Alice." Creepie said in her usual sarcastic tone.

Later after school, Creepie and Chris-Alice attended this activity. "Oh good. The volunteers are here." said a man with Gothic piercings and a mechanics outfit. "Yep! Creepie's here for her special fun activity!" Chris-Alice said. "What is this activity anyway?" Creepie said.

"Just something very special. You're going to...GET A TATTOO!!" the man said. "EEWW!!" Chris-Alice screamed, "A TATTOO?! THAT'S SO GROSS!!!" "Wicked." Creepie said with excitement, "I've always wanted a tattoo."

"Creepie? WHAT WILL YOUR PARENTS THINK?!" Chris-Alice said. "They won't mind." Creepie said, "My family's has a entire collection of bad habits." "Come with me." the man said.

Creepie follwoed while Chris-Alice shuddered. "Is your friend always like that?" the man asked Creepie. "She has her moments." Creepie said, "Got any bug tattoos?" "Just got these this morning." the man said as he held out a list of bug tattoos. "Let's see. I'll go with the...
114.title: A SUPER FUN ACTIVITY!

choices: She stumbles into Creepie's creepy house.
She goes trick or treating on Halloween!
She throws a slumber party for her and her friends.
She and Creepie are lab partners in class.
12.content: Alright, so what happens to Creepie's perky BFF?
12.title: Chris-Alice Hollyroller

121.content: Chris-Alice hummed happily as she walked home from school. "Oooh, I've been waiting to have a nice study sleep over with Creepie for ever!" She said happily as she stopped in front of Dweezlwood Manor and looked at her note. "yep, this is the place." She said, walking up the path and into the house. "Huh, no one's here." She walked into the living room and sat down, waiting Creepie when...
121.title: She stumbles into Creepie's creepy house.

choices: Was growing a pair of antennai.
Was slurping up the entire bowl of blue stuff.
1212.content:
Chris-Alice could be a bit impatient at times. She decided to go and see if she could find her friend. Chris-Alice wandered down a hallway. She was a bit nervous about being in the house, but it was Creepie's home. There couldn't be anything dangerous, right? Creepie! Chris-Alice called. Hmm, now where could she be?

The girl wandered into what looked like a kitchen. She noticed a bowl sitting on a table. It was filled with an odd substance. The substance seemed like jelly, or jam, but was a greenish-blue color. What's this? Chris-Alice wondered. She stuck a finger into the stuff and brought it to her mouth for a taste. Normally, Chris-Alice would never have considered doing such a thing, but she hadn't had lunch yet and was getting a bit peckish.

Besides, it was just one taste. She rationalized. I'm sure no one would mind. The stuff was sweet, but not like jam or jelly. It tasted almost like honey. Just then, the girl heard a voice, Chris-Alice? Creepie walked in. What are you doing here? She said. Chris-Alice giggled, absentminded to herself. Oh, come on, silly. She said. You know we have a study sleepover today.

I know that. Creepie replied. I meant why are you back here? I asked you to wait in the living room. Oh, I'm sorry. Chris-Alice said. I was just trying to find you. She giggled to herself again. Creepie arched an eyebrow, looking at the girl. Are...you feeling alright? She asked. I do seem to be a bit more giggly than usual today. Chris-Alice replied. But, don't worry, I'm fine.

Oh-kay. Creepie said. I'll just get some snacks for us and we can go straight to my room..l mean we can go up to my room and study. Okie-dokey. Chris-Alice replied. She sat down at the table and stared off into space. She seemed very odd today, but Creepie shrugged it off and started rummaging through the fridge.

O.k. let's see. Creepie said. This should be enough to tide us over for a while, at least until... Creepie gasped as she turned around and nearly dropped the food she was holding. Chris-Alice was still sitting at the table, but something was definitely off about her. She...
1212.title: Chris-Alice decides to explore

choices: Gallery (The place where the games are)
13.content: Two girls walked into the fairground, talking to each other on cellphones. "So, like, I heard the magic show is pretty good." Said Melanie, the ditzy blond. "Naw, I heard the hall of mirrors was pretty cool." Said Carla, the slightly smarter brunette. The two stopped in a little intersection four ways to go. The Magic Show, the Hall or Mirrors, the Gallery, and the food stands. The girls discussed it for a few minutes and decided...
13.title: Carla Cabrera and Melanie Melisma

14.content:
Raven McFadden was sitting in her dark and gloomy room, writing lyrics for her bands new song, as she wrote her phone. She grabbed her cell phone, which was as dark and gloomy as her room. It was Creepie! She asked it Raven would care to meet her at the Wiki Tiki, the hottest resturant in town. Raven declined, saying it was far too hot out for her. Creepie beeged her to come. Raven gave a sigh and said. "Sure, I'll come." She hung up as she got up and took a black umbrella and went outside.

The sun was beating down on her as she walked to the Wiki Tiki, she started feeling weird. What was happening to her?
14.title: Raven McFadden

151.content: Ooo, Creepie's mother gets to be the lucky victim! What's going to happen to the 3 inch tall mantis mother?
151.title: Caroleena Creecher

152.content: So, what's going to happen to Chris-Alice's just-as happy-go-lucky mother?
152.title: Bunny Hollyruler

info.brief_description: Transform the girls of Growing Up Creepie! C'mon, it'll be fun.
info.description:
The girls from Growing up Creepie undergo some STRAAAANGE transformations! Setting and used characters can be whatever you want. They can turn into animals, inanimate objects, alien creatures, they can be inflated, basically anything can happen. Want a girl to eat another girl? GO FOR IT! Want a girl to become a brand new planet? YOU GOT IT BOY. A few rules, though:

- No male TF.
- No gender bending into males.
- No werewolf TF. No offense to people that like it, I just find it boring and overdone.
- No crossovers with other shows
- Please try to write at least a paragraph. I hate when stories have, like, three words in a chapter.
info.pretty_title: Growing Up Creepie TF Interactive Story!
